description: This file contains CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for 'Note' objects using SQLAlchemy ORM. It includes functions for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes in a database.

methods.name: get_note(db: Session, note_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID from the database.

methods.name: get_notes(db: Session, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100)
methods.description: Retrieves a list of notes with optional pagination.

methods.name: create_note(db: Session, note: schemas.NoteCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new note in the database with provided data.

methods.name: update_note(db: Session, note_id: int, note_update: schemas.NoteUpdate)
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID with new data.

methods.name: delete_note(db: Session, note_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID from the database.

ctags.name: get_notes
ctags.pattern: /^def get_notes(db: Session, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100):$/

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(db: Session, note_id: int, note_update: schemas.NoteUpdate):$/
